Title: Bind the Glamour
Description: It has been a very, very long time since our tribe has been called on to perform this rite. I will do the best I can.
ObjectivesText: Allow Chief Rikkitun to enchant the Forked Blade.
RewardText:
The blade is prepared.

Now, only one task remains: you must use it.

Objectives.Text: Allow Chief Rikkitun to enchant the forked blade
